ODA Class is India’s Best Education App! 🎓 We Give 👩‍💻 Better Teacher - Better Education - Better Life 👨‍💻

📚 ODA Class LIVE Learning App for Class 6th to 10th Standard 📚

👪 1.2 Million Parents + Student Believe – We provide the Best Live Learning Classes 📱

Oda Classes is a new platform with most advanced technology with Dual Teacher System which will be most helpful to students’ learning.

Our Teacher from Top IIT, NIT provide you best Live Learning Experience for Class 6 to 10th Class


What we offer: 💻

 Free Live Class for limited period
 Dual teacher system
 24*7 doubt solving
 Assignments correction
 Learning report for Parents
 Interactive Live lessons
 Mock Test

We provide a personalized learning experience to students of CBSE students from Class 6-10 through extensive courses which are designed and taught by India’s most experienced & renowned teachers.

What makes ODA Class special?

ODA Class offers a one-of-a-kind LIVE interactive learning experience to students using a real-time learning platform

Key to success for any exam is personalized learning & extensive revision. The ODA Class App has “LIVE Classes” & “Conceptual videos” for an un-matched learning experience; “Test Modules” to help students prepare for exams, Chapter-wise NCERT Solutions, Detailed Syllabus, Previous-Year Papers, Sample Papers, Revision notes, Formula sheets and lots more for class 6, class 7, class 8, class 9, class 10

Features:

Attend FREE All India Mock Test: Turn Exam into a good rank, use ODA Class Learning App to test your preparation.

Oda Class: LIVE Learning App for Class 6-12 | JEE

Learn with IIT Teacher for FREE CLASS 6 to 12 | JEE LIVE ONLINE Tuition Classes

LIVE Video lectures for Class 6 - 10 e-learning: At ODA Class, you can learn any concept from India’s best teachers through LIVE videos!

ODA Class: The Learning App is the one stop solution for all your learning needs. On the app 6-10 graders from CBSE, NCERT & State Boards can learn from NCERT Solution & study materials.


Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and a lot more!

ODA Class: The LIVE Learning App for INDIANS STUDENTS - Quality Education from the comfort of your home📱 What we Believe.


ODA CLASS unique LIVE In-Class Unlimited Doubt Solving makes the classes more dynamic, ensuring effective Concept Learning for all students.


The Learning App offers “LIVE & Recorded Classes” & “Conceptual Videos” for a unique learning experience; “Test Modules” to help CBSE students prepare for exams, Chapter-wise NCERT Solutions for Maths and Science, Detailed Syllabus, Previous-Year Papers, Sample Papers, Revision notes, Formula sheets and lots more for class 6, class 7, class 8, class 9, class 10, class 11, class 12 and droppers, IIT JEE crash course, NEET Micro course will share sessions.

Complete Study Package: Get complete homework help including chapter-wise NCERT solutions for class 6, class 7, class 8, class 9, class 10, class 11 & class 12, Previous-Year Board & Other competitive exam solutions, Sample papers to practice, Revision Notes, Solutions.

Attend FREE Mock Test: The App gives access to practice papers, test series and All India Live test modules for IIT JEE, JEE Main, NEET, and other Competitive and Boards exams. Appear for the test & get an estimated All India Rank

LIVE Video lectures for Class 6-12: At ODA Class, you can learn any concept from India’s best teachers through LIVE videos. We provide a personalized learning experience to students of CBSE, from Classes 6-12, IIT JEE & NEET

Preparing for IIT JEE, JEE Main & JEE Advanced, NEET, KVPY, NTSE, Boards Exam, Olympiad? Learn LIVE Online from the safety of your home from India’s Best Education App!🎓

descriptionHtml:
ODA Class “Mock Test” - 1 Million K-10 Online Test – Sep 24th 2022 at 10 AM

ODA CLASS Mock Test 2022 - Pattern, Guidelines, Eligibility and Syllabus:
ODA CLASS Mock Test will be conducted online on 24 Sep 2022 at 10 AM and you can appear for the test from anywhere. Attend the mock test with 1 million peers to discovery your potential.

So, hurry up and enroll for free now.
About ODA CLASS MOCK TEST:
ODA CLASS Mock Test- which will be conducted for K-10 students. This test will be an objective test to assess the key understanding of students in core subject maths and science along with mental ability.
The Test is designed by IIT/NIT Master Teachers experts in the field of education with 10+ years of experience. The key idea is to provide a relevant trustworthy and effective way for students to understand their strengths and weaknesses. This test will be written by lakhs of students and it will provide benefits to toppers of the test. All questions of the test will be objective type and there will not be any negative marking. You can avail of the scholarship with the help of our academic counselors who will share all the necessary details after the results are announced.

This test will be an objective test to assess the key understanding of students in core subject maths and science along with mental ability.
OSAT encourages talent and provides unparalleled exposure to students who wish to appear in national and international examinations. It evaluates academic potential and allows students to assess their performance at the all-India levels. OSAT helps students nurture their minds for higher targets of tomorrow and empowers them to study at ODA to prepare for competitive exams by receiving high admission scholarships. Through the exam, ODA strives to inspire, nurture and reward young talent.

• Mode of Test: Online
• Type of Test: Objective
• K10: Class 1 to Class 10 can avail of the test.

1. Analyze student strengths and key areas of improvement with respect to the skills required to qualify for an upcoming exam.
2. Assess their understanding of basic concepts.
3. Benchmark themselves against other students at the state and All-India levels.
4. Understand the gaps in their preparation for future competitive exams and take corrective actions.
5. Scorecard showing their Percentile, Subject-wise Analytics, and Subject-wise improvement points.

• K10: Class 1 to Class 10 can avail of the test.

1. Analyze student strengths and key areas of improvement with respect to the skills required to qualify for an upcoming exam.
2. Assess their understanding of basic concepts.
3. Benchmark themselves against other students at the state and All-India levels.
4. Understand the gaps in their preparation for future competitive exams and take corrective actions.
5. Scorecard showing their Percentile, Subject-wise Analytics, and Subject-wise improvement points.

🇮🇳 Learn with experienced IIT teachers, Free Live Learning App Class 1-10🇮🇳 🎓

ODA Class is India’s Live Learning Education App! 👩‍💻

Better Teacher - Better Education - Better Life 👨‍💻

Expert Teachers from 📚 IITs/NITs, Mentored Top Rankers of AIR2 – Learn from India’s Best Teachers. 📚
ODA Class LIVE Learning App for Class 1st to 10th Standard 📚 Made in India 📚

ODA Bridge Course 📚
• 10 Sessions to kick-start new academic year
• Develop problem solving ability
• 2 Session to guide student on right career path
• Learn multiple methods to solve problems 📚 Why Bridge Course?
• Exam oriented practice
• Special focus on basics of topics
• Analytical and HOTS questions

👪 3+ Million Parents & Students Believe “ ODA CLASS ” – We provide the Best Live Learning Classes
📱 Oda Classes is the best platform with the most advanced technology and Dual Teacher System which will be most helpful to students’ learning. Our Teachers from Top IIT's & NIT's provide you the best Live Learning Experience for Class 1 to 10 students.

What we offer:
v Live Interactive lessons
v Free Live Classes
v Dual Teacher System
v In Class Doubt Solving
v Assignments Correction
v Learning Report for Parents
v Mock Tests

What makes ODA Class special?
ODA Class offers a one-of-a-kind LIVE interactive learning experience to students using a real-time learning platform. Key to success for any exam is personalized learning & extensive revision.

The ODA Class App has “LIVE Classes” & “Conceptual videos” for an un-matched learning experience;
“Test Modules” to help students prepare for exams, Chapter-wise NCERT Solutions, Detailed Syllabus, Previous-Year Papers, Sample Papers, Revision notes, Formula sheets and lots more for Class 1 to 10

Oda Class: LIVE Learning with IIT Teachers for Class 1 to 10 | CBSE – Best Online Live Tuition app LIVE videos!

The Learning App is the one stop solution for all your learning needs. In the app 1-10 graders from CBSE, NCERT & State Boards can learn from NCERT Solution & study materials.
Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Biology!
Education from the comfort of your home📱

What we Believe.
ODA CLASS unique LIVE In-Class Unlimited Doubt Solving makes the classes more dynamic, ensuring effective Concept Learning for all students.

Complete Study Package: Get complete homework help including chapter-wise NCERT solutions for class 1 to class 10, Previous-Year Board & Other competitive exam solutions, Sample papers to practice, Revision Notes, Solutions.

Follow US
